page.title: 12FARMLAND (CROPS)
page.content: The average farmer in our area will plant perhaps four crops: Winter Wheat, Winter Barley, Oil Seed Rape and Beans. Between 40% and 60% of his land might be covered by Winter Wheat which is planted in October and harvested in July/August. Another 20% of his land might be used for Winter Barley which is planted and harvested at more or less the same time as Winter Wheat. Perhaps another 20% would be used for either Oil Seed Rape or Beans, or possibly both. Our area has a mineral deficiency of phosphate, so the rest of the land would be left fallow with some phosphate on it to recover for a year.
